summary: Just though I'd share my latest THICC BodySlide preset for CBBE. If you prefer a more "thick-fit" type of body then Weight 0 is for you. If you prefer a more buxom Norse goddess then Weight 100 and a slightly higher body scale looks pretty sweet.
descriptionHtml:
This is a re-do of my first attempt at a mod - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86926]Gammag33k's Thicc Bodyslide Preset[/url] .  I increased some of the curves on 100 weight and added some curves/smoothness to 0 weight. Finally, I rounded out the hip to waist ratio a bit and used Clams of Skyrim as a base...so there are a few extra slider details ;-)


Mods in Screenshots:

Fox46 Armor - fox6000 (Bodyslide modification by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16229004/?tb=about&pUp=1]Alunder[/url])
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512]Leyenda Skin 4.0 CBBE [/url]- by  HeroedeLeyenda
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90169]Caffeine ENB [/url]﻿- by ZwabberdieBo
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty [/url] - by LogRaam

author: gammag33k
